getInterval().Description: Returns the periodic advertising interval, in 1.25ms unit. Valid values are from 80 (100ms) to 65519 (81.89875s).

ClassDesc: The @B_android#bluetooth#le#PeriodicAdvertisingParameters_E@ provide a way to adjust periodic advertising preferences for each Bluetooth LE advertising set. Use @B_android#bluetooth#le#AdvertisingSetParameters#Builder_E@ to create an instance of this class.
